name: SUPERHOT: Mechanic Test
description:
This is my attempt at recreating the mechanics and feel of SUPERHOT as part of a C++ learning journey for myself, where using Unreal Engine 4 and C++ I am trying to improve my skills as a gameplay programmer and a designer.

The playthrough is probably around a minute or two minutes long but it accurately shows all the mechanics I've created.

Due to the nature of this project art, animation, audio and anything else visual is a prototype/basic level due to the main focus for me being the programming side of things.

Also due to me still learning C++ some aspects may not work as intended, I have tested and iterated on code as much as I currently can to try to bring out a working recreation of a game which I admire a lot. So I hope you enjoy :)

You can watch the linked video (top right corner) to hear more on my process of making this recreation!
